attributes.action: quit pussy footing about cycling and make proper cycle lanes seperate from cars and pedestrians
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would love to use my bike, but am afraid of aggressive drivers, and dont want to be in the way of pedestrians,hte so called bike lanes are hopeless,too small, rarer than rare, and usually full of glass and rubbish, so why not make proper cycle lanes that do not interfere with people or cars, it would improve the environment and improve peoples health too

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
